yum -y install oracle-j2sdk1.7

yum -y install cloudera-manager-server cloudera-manager-daemons	

/usr/share/cmf/schema/scm_prepare_database.sh mysql -h ip-172-31-85-79.ec2.internal:3306 scm dbadmin
